game.title: Eclipse Rising
game.synopsis: In a world where the land is scorched and the skies are perpetually shrouded in a deep, bloody haze, the remnants of humanity cling to existence in sprawling metropolises built upon the backs of gargantuan, ancient creatures. These leviathans, known as "The Pillars," have stood steadfast for millennia, their bodies a labyrinth of tunnels and caverns that shelter cities which are as much marvels of engineering as they are bastions against the desolate wasteland outside.
game.beginning: Players take on the role of an Arkeon, a member of an ancient lineage blessed with the power to harness the essence of The Pillars. With this unique gift, they must navigate the intricate web of alliances and rivalries between cities, all while unraveling the mysteries behind a cataclysmic event known as "The Great Eclipse" that threatens the very foundation of their world.
game.ending: As the Arkeon delves deeper into the heart of The Pillars, they discover that the path to saving their world may not lie in preserving its current form but in embracing a transformation that could redefine what it means to be human. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, players must confront their own identity and decide whether to cling to the familiar or leap into an unknown future.
